goal.en: The objective of this course is to provide an introduction to a few well-known econometric tools that are commonly used in applied research with data in business, economics and finance. Topics covered include ARMA models, vector autoregressions (VAR), unit roots, ARCH/GARCH models, and nonlinear time series models such as threshold and regime-switching models. A balance will be maintained between the theoretical analysis and real applications.
